items.text: tries to flick a fuller one and wears it on the pad as the ball rolls away into the leg side
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText: Parth Gulati: "The reason why Rohit is not bringing in Jadhav yet is tgat he wants his batsmen to spend sometime in the middle before the all important match aginst Pakistan"
items.text: backs away and Bumrah follows him, angling it in to beat him
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: shortish, makes room and finds short third man after opening the face
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: short and slapped hard to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: angles in a length ball, has everything Mashrafe needed: a helpful angle, in his swinging arc, and shovelled over long-on
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, SIX runs

items.text: this one's shorter and he backs away before slapping it straight over, lands just after crossing the boundary
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, SIX runs

items.text: straight to short fine leg. Bumrah was right there, waiting for that, and Mashrafe has picked him out. Hardly a delivery that deserved a wicket. Full toss - a yorker gone wrong - around off, Mash shuffles and tries to paddle it away, goes no further than Bumrah's reverse-cupped hands
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Bumrah b Kumar 26 (32b 0x4 2x6) SR: 81.25

items.text: walks across and blocks to point
items.shortText: Kumar to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: backs away, leaving his stumps dangerously exposed, manages to get bat on ball
items.shortText: Kumar to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: drills a full toss straight back
items.shortText: Kumar to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: throws his hands at a wide fuller ball and carves it over the in-field through point
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: snapped up by Dhawan at deep midwicket. Doesn't get hold of his pull, doesn't quite come onto the bat. Besides, he has to fetch it from outside off. Doesn't get the distance. Dhawan runs in and snaffles it low and slaps his thighs
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c Dhawan b Bumrah 42 (50b 2x4 2x6) SR: 84.00

items.text: full, angled across, pushed to cover
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: backs away and swings. Angle's too sharp across him and he gets beaten
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: yorker, pushed across outside off, dug out towards mid-off
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short of length on off, punched to extra cover and is sent back
items.shortText: Bumrah to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.preText: Megha: "What's with India and 20 year old all rounders in the opposition"
items.text: full, pushed down to long-on
items.shortText: Kumar to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: swings for a pull and makes no contact
items.shortText: Kumar to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: dropped. Jadeja nearly got there, though. Leading edge as he completes the swing on the pull early. Jadeja sprints from short third man, bends forward and gets a hand to it but the ball pops out. Very tough chance
items.shortText: Kumar to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

items.text: top-edges a pull to deep square leg
items.shortText: Kumar to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: beaten by lack of pace again as he finishes swinging and gets hit on the back shoulder, Dhoni dives to grab the deflection
items.shortText: Kumar to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: fullish length, backs away and slaps to extra cover
items.shortText: Kumar to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: short ball, tucked up for room, scampers away and awkwardly tilts away as he tries to slap it. Miscues it to cover where Dhawan takes it easily
items.postText: 7.05pm That wraps up a clinical bowling performance from India. Seized the advantage early and never relinquished it. They were at it, relentless for most of it, barring that eighth-wicket stand between Mashrafe and Mehidy. But for that, this could've ended a lot quicker and a lot worse for Bangladesh. Jadeja celebrates his return to ODI colours with a brilliant four-wicket haul. Bumrah and Bhuvneshwar, the new-ball bowlers snapped up the rest. Bangladesh's batsmen played out 190 dot balls. That's 31.4 out of the 49.1 overs they batted. Rare it is that such numbers go unpunished in the modern game, where strike rotation and singles have come to assume more importance than they have at any point in history. If you're the kind that really likes to look at the bright side of things, though, they have played a good T20 innings here. "Very happy with my performance," says Ravi Jadeja. "I didn't play shorter formats since so long. I was not focusing on my no-ball. My foot just went ahead of the crease. I was just thinking of what ball I should bowl to him and I went for the full one. I think wicket is on the slower side, but we have good experience in the batting and can chase it down easily." Snehil: "The announcer and DJ at the ground have been very witty in this tournament. throughout the innings, he was cheering the Indian crowd. But, after the BD team got out for 173, he was shouting on the mic- "Bangladesh supporters don't go anywhere, I promise you that you are winning tonight."" Swapnil : "Every team is making low score against India just to prevent Rohit from making double centuries. It's a sabotage. "
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mustafizur Rahman, OUT

dismissal.text: Mustafizur Rahman c Dhawan b Bumrah 3 (9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33
